metadata.title: CVE-2019-2393 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which use $lookup and collations.This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.1; MongoDBServer v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.13 and MongoDB Server v3.6 versions priorto 3.6.15.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
